title: Best weekend of NFL EVER? Mahomes new nickname, Brady and Rodgers futures, Trust in Garoppolo and Burrow
itunes:title: Best weekend of NFL EVER? Mahomes new nickname, Brady and Rodgers futures, Trust in Garoppolo and Burrow
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Hall of Famer Cris Carter discuss what could've been the best weekend of football in the history of the NFL. The crew examines the QB play from all four teams while beginning to look at the futures of Tom Brady and Aaron Rodgers. It's time to trust Jimmy Garoppolo while Joe Burrow continues to be better than advertised. Nate Burleson joins the show to discuss Bills-Chiefs coming down to overtime, Tom Brady's future and his continued respect for Matt Stafford. We wrap by delivering Game Balls for the Divisional Round Playoff games.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
